::Feline::

She watched as Cybershark walked past her and HotRod.   SHe saw 
Cybershark put Battera into a chamber and then run out again.

She looked at HotRod, "On second thought, I could use your help."
She walked over to the CR and make sure Battera was ok.  She was 
healing steadily in the chamber.

She walked back to HorRod, "Unfortunately, she will be in there for a 
while. That will give us time to get things ready, just in case."
SHe knew that despite the fact this was unforeseen, she could still 
use the opertinuty and put a chip inside Battera.  But it would have 
to wait untill she came out of the chamber.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "David Torrey" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::CyberShark::
> 
>     He began to cry. He finally found a CR Chamber and lowered her 
inside. His now crimson eyes were tear filled when he pushed the 
button for repair.
>     "I love you too," He left the room and went outside the 
CF. "Kluster, or any Maximal on the CF, please notify me once Battera 
is out of the CR Chamber, I'm going to kill, well, I don't know his 
name."
>     He went out, and with his low power reserves he really 
shouldn't have. But he soon caught up to a wolfish bot.
>     "Are you CyberShark?" It asked.
>     "Yes, what are you after?" CyberShark asked, sensing a quest in 
this bot.
>     "I'm after Primal Prime."
>     "What?! Why? He is a Maximal, like you," CyberShark said.
>     "Not anymore, I can smell the stench of evil on him." Eclipse 
said.
>     "On Optimus Prime? I can't believe it." CyberShark said as he 
sped past him and after Dark Prime.

>   ::Battera::
> 
>   She rolled onto her side and gasped in pain.  She cried.  She 
coun't 
>   really move at all.  The wound sent waves of pain through her 
body.  
>   She cried and whispered, "CYbershark,   I love you." She closed 
her 
>   eyes and passed out, laying on her side, in a growing puddle of 
mech 
>   fluid.
>

hand 
>   blade started to spin and he went after Dark Prime. Prime moved

blades

>   missles at Prime. Prime was hit, he got up, leaking mech fluid 
and 
>   ran off.
>   >     "If she dies, I will hunt you to the ends of the Earth!" 
>   CyberShark roared after him. He picked up Battera and rushed her 
into

>   >     "Where are the CR Chambers in this slagging ship?!"

maximal..."
